transcript:
Hello?
Executive: Yes sir, good good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon sir.
Executive: Uh sir this side Imran calling from India Mart. How are you sir?
Customer: I'm fine sir. Thank you.
Executive: Yes sir. So actually sir as discussed last two weeks sir. Still sir welcome call. I'm in office now right now. I'll call you in evening sir.
Customer: Uh sir can you provide my suitable time sir according to that we will connect with you sir. I'll call you right now.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to schedule a call at a suitable time.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to call in the evening.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer will call the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

india mart, welcome call, scheduling
